level.heading: CHANGES IN NAME, ADDRESS, OR OFFICE HOURS (ยง 17-2405)

level.text: Each notary shall inform the Mayor promptly of any change in name, address, or office hours.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: ยง1.4(a) of Regulation No. 73-13, approved May 24, 1973, 19 DCR 1147, 1148 (June 11, 1973), 25 DCRR ยง1.4.
